summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackThe iconic marine-powered, wrinkle-smoothing day cream, ELEMIS Pro-Collagen Marine Cream, is a rejuvenating moisturizer that significantly reduces the look of fine lines and wrinkles in just 2 weeks.
details: DetailsBenefitsGreat for: Visible Signs of Aging, Dryness, Dullness, Wrinkles, Sagging, Under MakeupHelps to: Reduce Lines and Wrinkles, Hydrate, Firm, SmoothAward-winning anti-aging day creamSuper moisturizing yet ultra-light gel cream creates the perfect base for makeupHelps improve the look of firmness and elasticity, revealing a smooth and rejuvenated complexionScent: infused with rose and mimosa for a delicate floral aromaSuitable for all skin typesKey IngredientsPadina Pavonica: rich in polysaccharides that quenches skin with moisture for a visibly radiant complexionChlorella: soothes and hydrates skin while protecting it from environmental stressorsGinkgo Biloba: helps protect the skin from everyday stressors that cause premature signs of agingMimosa: Soothes skin with its anti-inflammatory and toning propertiesResearch ResultsClinically proven to significantly reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles in 14 days*Clinically proven to deliver instant and 24-hour hydration*97% agreed this product left their skin feeling nourished**97% agreed this product left their skin looking and feeling smoother**95% agreed this product left their skin with a youthful, dewy looking glow**Independent Clinical Trials 2021. Results based on 38 people over 4 weeks.**Independent User Trials 2021. Results based on 120 people over 4 weeks.Item 2533936How To UseUse every morning on cleansed, dry skin. Apply a pea size amount into the hands and warm together.Gently smooth over the face, neck and décolleté.IngredientsAqua/Water/Eau, Glycerin, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Glyceryl Stearate SE, Isononyl Isononanoate, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Dimethicone, Phenoxyethanol, Polyacrylate-13, Cetyl Alcohol, Stearic Acid, Tocopheryl Acetate, Coco-Caprylate, Xanthan Gum, Polyisobutene, Fragrance (Parfum), Tocopherol, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Chlorphenesin, Triticum Vulgare (Wheat) Germ Oil, Chlorella Vulgaris Extract, Glyceryl Polyacrylate, Daucus Carota Sativa (Carrot) Root Extract, Glyceryl Acrylate/Acrylic Acid Copolymer, Disodium EDTA, Padina Pavonica Thallus Extract, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Polysorbate 20, Sorbitan Isostearate, Ginkgo Biloba Leaf Extract, Porphyridium Cruentum Extract, Mimosa Tenuiflora Bark Extract, Rosa Damascena Flower Extract, Collagen Amino Acids, Linalool, Citronellol, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Limonene, Geraniol, Citric AcidShipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Use every morning on cleansed, dry skin. Apply a pea size amount into the hands and warm together.Gently smooth over the face, neck and décolleté.

reviews.headline: So good
reviews.comments: This is so cheap i love it it apllies really smoothly i love it , it smells like ice cream on a hot summer beach day ! I reall recommend it ols buy its so good so worth buying , and so worht trying i have about 19 restocks of it thats hiw good it is!!!

reviews.headline: Pre skin care
reviews.comments: I received the night cream pro collagen night cream as a gift. I been loving how hydrated, soft and fresh it feels on my sensitive skin. It been giving my skin that extra boost hydration on it and loving it feels all night

reviews.headline: Definitely buying more!
reviews.comments: I got the Pro-Collagen Marine Cream complimentary from Elemis and I absolutely love it! I've been wanting to explore new skincare products with a collagen focus as I get closer to thirty and this one goes on so nicely. Perfect addition to my morning routine.

reviews.headline: In love with this cream
reviews.comments: This is my favorite cream ! It makes such a difference for my skin . I've been using it for quite a while now and I love that it keeps my skin hydrated. I have a beautiful glow every time I use it. It has such a divine texture and smells fantastic. This product was gifted by Elemis

reviews.headline: Nice cream
reviews.comments: Elemis pro collagen marine cream is a light cream texture with a scent (might be stronger to some people). The cream is hydrating and nourishing with quick absorption into my skin leaving a silky feel. Complimentary from Elemis.

reviews.headline: love it!
reviews.comments: I received this product complimentary from Elemis in exchange for my honest opinion. I have been using this cream for a couple weeks and I am satisfied. I have dry skin and I feel like this cream has really been helping me have an overall nicer skin. I wear a lot of makeup and I especially notice this when i am applying my makeup. My base is just so much better and more cooperative than before because my skin is plumper and looks great. Overall, very satisfied

reviews.headline: My favorite for daily routine
reviews.comments: I've been using the Pro-Collagen Marine Cream Gifted by elemis for a couple of weeks now and it's been great. I specifically chose the version without SPF to use it as my daytime moisturizer, and it works perfectly for that. The texture is rich but not heavy, absorbs quickly, and leaves my skin feeling smooth and hydrated. I have combination skin, and this cream gives me enough moisture without making my T-zone greasy. The scent is light and pleasant too.

reviews.headline: Lovely Hydrating Day Cream
reviews.comments: I've been using this Elemis Pro-Collagen Marine Cream Hydrating Day Cream for two weeks and I'm definitely a fan. I use it in the AM after the Resurfacing Super-C Serum and feel like it makes my skin look and feel brigh, healthy and hyrated. I will mention that the scent is so divine, but it's very strong so be aware if you are sensitive to fragrance. For reference, I am in my mid-40s with combo skin. Honest review but gifted by elemis.

reviews.headline: Nice cream
reviews.comments: It's a nice cream and I like it. The only complaint I have is that it has SUCH a strong scent ,wish it were a bit milder. I would absolutely purchase Just wish it didn't have such a strong smell. Complimentary from elemis.

reviews.headline: Nice cream!
reviews.comments: It's a nice cream and I like it. The only complaint I have is that it has SUCH a strong scent ,wish it were a bit milder. I would absolutely purchase Just wish it didn't have such a strong smell. Complimentary from elemis.

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: I received this product gifted by Elemis and I love it! I have combo skin and this Pro-Collagen Marine cream from Elemis has really helped me take care of it. My skin feels soft and smooth. I have worn this everyday with no breakouts.

reviews.headline: Luxurious cream
reviews.comments: This is my favorite in the marine collagen line! Love the anti aging ingredients and the way it makes my skin feels. The texture is smooth and silky and has mild scent. My skin looks hydrated and plump after using this. Definitely recommend. Gifted by elemis!

reviews.headline: Leaves skin soft and supple
reviews.comments: The  texture of this day cream is beautifully light yet deeply hydrating, making it a great base under makeup. My skin feels smoother and more supple, and while the fine lines haven't vanished, they do appear softer.  I really like the subtle floral scent.  It's a nice scent that isn't too strong.  It's pricey, but the results and luxurious feel make it worth the splurge.  This was gifted by Elemis.

reviews.headline: Daily Day Cream
reviews.comments: This hydrating day cream is my skin's summer savior! The dry weather has killed all hydration and this has brought it back to life! It feels great, has a subtle scent, and applies evenly and easily without any pilling. A fantastic cream for year round use! Gifted by Elemis.

reviews.headline: WORKS GREAT
reviews.comments: This creme moisturizer feels luxurious, and delivers deep hydration and a smoother texture to my skin. My skin feels firmer and I love the light elegant scent that enhances the pampering experience complimentary from elemis!

reviews.headline: Amazing!!
reviews.comments: I love this moisturizer so much and it really works so amazing. A little bit of product goes a long way, just like with other Elemis products. I use it every morning and it makes my skin feel SO soft! I got this for free complimentary from Elemis, in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.headline: Hydrating
reviews.comments: It's my third time using Elemis Pro-Collagen Marine Moisturizer and it's definitely in my Top 5. I have a combination skin type and somewhat sensitive skin. This moisturizer has a lightweight yet very hydrating formula that doesn't leave a tacky finish and sits well under my makeup. My skin feels bouncy and refreshed after using it. The scent is very mild and doesn't bother me. Gifted by Elemis

reviews.headline: Love this cream!
reviews.comments: This product was Gifted by elemis in exchange for my honest review. I love this cream so much! It doesn't feel too heavy on my skin- and doesn't feel sticky- it absorbs into my skin fast too. Very lightly scented. I've used it for over a week and a half and it has left my skin feeling moisturized and hydrated without causing a breakout. (Some other moisturizers can cause those for me sadly.) I do notice my fine lines look less pronounced since using this cream too. Hopefully it helps even more as I use this! It layered well under my daily makeup and acted great as a primer. Definitely recommend trying this out!

reviews.headline: Love this product!
reviews.comments: The Pro-Collagen Marine Cream from Elemis is one of my all-time favorite products! I love how hydrated and plump my skin feels after using it, and it is so high-quality! It also smells amazing!! Complimentary from elemis

reviews.headline: Amazing
reviews.comments: This is my going every morning (and sometimes at night) if I would like my skin to look hydrated and feel silky. I've been told that I have a "radiance" since I started using it almost 15 days! I have tried everything from high-end to low-end and ELEMIS hands down wins every time. Complimentary from elemis

faceoff_positive.comments: I tried this cream in a cruise last year and i really loved it, but couldn't get it at the moment. Finally took the plunge and purchased it with the pro-collage marine oil and eye serum. OMG! This is what my skin needed! I have combination, acne prone skin, with weird dry patches in unusual places. This combo has controlled my oils and balanced my skin in a way no other cream was able to. I barely have any breakouts (unless i really mess it up with my diet) and my makeup last longer and looks way better than before starting using this cream.  Trust me people, sometimes we need to indulge.  This is a good product to invest on.
faceoff_positive.headline: Just wonderful!

faceoff_negative.comments: I bought this at a premium from a spa as part of a comprehensive facial regimen including toner, this cream, and several other pro-collagen products. They sit on my skin and literally pill off! I thought it was from layering too many products so I've tried using it after the cleanser...still pills. After cleanser and just toner...still pills! For the price this is so disappointing. I must have $1000 worth of ELEMIS products that are not hydrating and not doing a thing for my skin as they pill up and wipe off.
faceoff_negative.headline: This pills up and slides off?
